transArray.content: The service attitude of the front desk staff of the hotel is very good, and all problems are solved in time. The cleaning lady is also very kind. The room on the fourth floor is very big and clean, and there is a balcony where you can dry clothes. You just have to take the stairs from the third floor to the fourth floor. It doesnâ€™t matter if you have a husband by your side. The bathrooms in the room are all made of glass. My family It's okay, it's a bit embarrassing if you're not familiar with it
